wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Wilson (born 27 September 1940) is an English former professional footballer who scored 28 goals from 229 goals in the Football League. A winger, he played for Sheffield United, Scunthorpe United, Doncaster Rovers, Chesterfield and Aldershot.

response: Andrew or Andy Wilson may refer to:
*Andy Wilson (director) (born 1958), British film, TV and theatre director
*Andy Wilson (Australian rules footballer) (born 1951), former Australian rules footballer
